short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Interact with Foundation Zero in the AWS Console!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Foundation Zero Wingman fetches cost saving recommendations from Foundation Zero and presents only the recommendations for services and regions you are using in the AWS Console.

Wingman is only active when you are in the AWS Console. After installation it will start monitoring the AWS services you use / browse to in the console and will start fetching relevant recommendations for that service and region.

If you would like to sign up to use Foundation Zero, please contact us at connect@foundationzero.io or visit our site at foundationzero.io.

🎉  Release Notes 🎉 

🏗  0.0.3
- UI tweaks

🏗  0.0.2 Bug Fixes
- Fixed a bug causing auth sessions to not be refreshed

🏗  0.0.1 
- Initial release includes all recommendations currently available in Foundation Zero.
